Welcome to

Techno mark

We are software development outsourcing company

Our Services

We provide wide range of services, from a front-end / back-end development to a system administration, devops and scalability of a production infrastructure. We have flexible forms of interaction with customers, it may be allocation of a required specialist to the team of a customer or development of a project by our team following customers requirements.

Technologies stack

Our team has the expertise in a following subjects

Front-end development

Java native Android development
Html / CSS
Javascript / JQuery
Angularjs
Bootstrap, preprocessor SASS / LESS
packages bower / glup

Back-end development

Java / Spring (mvc, data, Boot, security)
Python / Flask / uwsgi
Nodejs / Express / Mongodb
PHP / Codeigniter
Mysql / Postgresql / Memcache / Redis

DevOps / System administration

Centos administration
Python / Bash automatization
Ansible
Docker / LXC containers
Gitlab / Jenkins deployment
Microservice architecture
Highload scalability and tuning of systems
Zabbix monitoring
